name: Reception 24/7 Agent
problem: Missed calls during lunch breaks, after hours, and busy periods
how: AI agent answers all calls with natural conversation, books appointments, and handles basic inquiries

name: Appointment Reminder System
problem: High no-show rates reducing daily revenue
how: Automated voice calls 24-48 hours before appointments with personalized confirmations

name: Emergency Management Agent
problem: Delayed emergency response losing premium service opportunities
how: Immediate triage of emergency calls, dispatch coordination, and customer updates

name: Quote Follow-Up Agent
problem: Poor follow-up on estimates resulting in lost sales
how: Automated follow-up calls within 24-48 hours of estimate delivery with objection handling

name: Review Booster Agent
problem: Lack of online reviews affecting new customer acquisition
how: Post-service calls requesting reviews with personalized approach based on satisfaction

name: Lead Reactivation System
problem: Cold leads not being followed up systematically
how: Automated nurture sequences with personalized outreach based on lead source and interest
